revised_title: Vibrations of Rifle Barrels: A Study of Ballistic Deflection
tldr: This paper presents an experimental study on the vibrations of rifle barrels and their impact on shooting accuracy. The author, A. Mallock, discusses the historical background of the topic and compares his findings with previous research by Cranz and Koch. The results provide insights into the factors affecting ballistic deflection and contribute to the understanding of rifle barrel vibrations.
